pages.text: A good source of steam to start is the $(item)Small Steam Liquid Boiler/$. You can fuel it with lava, which is easily generated from cobblestone in a $(item)Refractory Crucible/$.$(p)The first machine you need is a $(item)Steam Alloy Smelter/$, which lets you make $(item)coke bricks/$ for the $(item)Coke Oven/$, and easier $(item)bronze/$.

All steam boilers must be kept supplied with water at all times. Water going into an empty hot boiler will $(bold)explode/$. A $(item)Primitive Water Pump/$ will help immensely, as it generates 250L of water per second for free.$(p)It just needs treated wood, created from creosote, which is made either in a Refractory Burn setup (with charcoal blocks) or a Coke Oven.
